events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and will begin review shortly.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on keywords such as 'software' and 'developer' in the resume.
A recruiter with expertise in technology hiring has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process.
The initial screening call went well; the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of core software development principles.
The candidate promptly responded to the screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview.
The technical interview was successfully scheduled with the senior engineering panel for next week.
